original_text: Each person must respect his mother and his father. All the people must keep the Sabbath as a day of rest. I am the Lord your God.
korean_text: 너희 각 사람은 부모를 경외하고 나의 안식일을 지키라 나는 너희의 하나님 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: Each person must respect his mother
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자기 어머니를 존중해야 한다

sentences.original_text: All the people must keep the Sabbath
I am the Lord your God
